views.markdown:
Added support for iOS 12 and A12 devices. Note: This requires latest Rocketbootstrap from http://rpetri.ch/repo. 1. Added support for iOS 11 (Electra JB).
2. Added support for iPhone X, 8 and 8 Plus.
3. Removed support for WhatsApp. If you want WhatsApp support, please see 'Copic For WhatsApp'.
3. Fixed few issues reported on previous version.
1. Fixed Phone app crash in 9.X devices 1. WhatsApp support removed.
2. Few enhancements and optimizations added.
3. Fixed a rare crash that causes restart of iPhone 7+ running on 10.1.1.
4. Fixed few rare issues that cause the crashes of MobilePhone and SpringBoard app.
Added support for latest WhatsApp (2.17.50 & 51). Fixed latest WhatsApp (2.17.31) compatibility issues. 1. Added support for latest WhatsApp (2.17.20)
2. Fixed WhatsApp not showing contact images in its contact pickers.
Added support for iOS 10
Added support for iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus
What's new in 1.0.2:
======================

1. Added support for latest WhatsApp (2.16.10).
2. Fixed, while choosing a contact to begin a new WhatsApp conversation, Copic is displaying default monograms not actual contact images.
3. Fixed, sometimes Copic doesn't show actual WhatsApp contact image though the contact has WhatsApp profile image.
1. Fixed unable to set 'My Avatar' in Messages settings.
2. Fixed WhatsApp crashes while adding a unknown number to existing contact or creating a new contact.
3. Added Couria and QuickReply For WhatsApp support.
4. Fixed broken support for RTL (Hebrew, etc) language layout s.
